## DateTimeValue interface

Represents datetime value as period

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DateTimeValue<TDate = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [from](./datetime.datetimevalue.from.md) | TDate | Starting date and time of period |
|  [to](./datetime.datetimevalue.to.md) | TDate | Ending date and time of period |
